pages.text: A Buddycard Binder is an easy storage solution for your Buddycards. Each one has 54 card slots that can hold a stack each, and can be expanded with the Extra Page enchantment. $(br2)Depending on the cards you use to craft it, the color of the binder will vary.

pages.title: Binder Enchantments
pages.text: A Buddycard Binder can also be enchanted with Buddy Binding and Extra Page.
